title: Walking Through Each Choice
text: $$x̄_A$$ - $$x̄_B$$ $$=$$ difference in the sample mean amount of time girls and boys play \\n P-value $$=$$ how likely the data occurred under the null hypothesis \\n $$t_{df}$$ $$=$$ distribution for the test

title: Random Variable
text: Which of the following solves for the random variable: Student's t, p-value, or $$x̄_A$$ - $$x̄_B$$?
